ARABIC: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ مَأْوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: their shelter will be the Fire because of what they earned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Will have Hell as their abode for what they have earned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: their abode shall be the Fire in return for their misdeeds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: will all have the Fire as their dwelling for that which they had done.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Their destination is hell – the recompense of their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those, their abode will be the Fire, because of what they used to earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (As for) those, their abode is the fire because of what they earned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: those -- their refuge is the Fire, for that they have been earning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Their home will be the Fire because of what they used to earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: shall have their abode in the Fire in requital for their deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: These! their abode shall be the Fire, for that which they have been earning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —it is they whose refuge shall be the Fire because of what they used to earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Their abode is the Fire, because of the (evil) they earned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those, their abode will be the Fire, because of what they used to earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: for them, their refuge is the Fire for what they have been earning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: These—their dwelling is the Fire—on account of what they used to do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: For those their refuge will be the Fire because of what they used to earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:8] those, their abode will be the Fire because of what they used to earn, in the way of [practising] idolatry and [performing] acts of disobedience.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Their home) their destiny (will be the Fire because of what they used to earn) because of what they used to say and do of idolatry.
